home.heroTitle: Custom Furniture, Built for Your Space.
home.heroSubtitle: From idea to installation, we design and build furniture tailored to your home and lifestyle.
home.storyParagraph1: For over a decade, Ansa Furniture has been transforming homes across Albania with custom-designed and expertly crafted furniture. What started as a small workshop in Tirana has grown into a trusted name in bespoke furniture design.
home.storyParagraph2: We believe every home is unique, and your furniture should be too. That's why we don't sell pre-made pieces. Instead, we work closely with you to understand your space, your style, and your needs—then we design and build furniture that's perfectly tailored to your life.
home.storyParagraph3: Our craftsmen combine traditional woodworking techniques with modern design principles to create furniture that's not only beautiful but built to last for generations.
home.quote: Excellence is not a destination, it's a continuous journey that never ends.
home.workshopSubtitle: What sets us apart is our dedication to bringing your vision to life with uncompromising quality and attention to detail.

feature1.title: Tailored Designs for Your Space
feature1.description: Every piece is custom-designed to fit your exact measurements, style preferences, and functional needs. No two projects are the same.

feature2.title: Handcrafted Precision
feature2.description: Our skilled craftsmen use time-tested techniques and state-of-the-art tools to ensure every joint, edge, and finish is perfect.

feature3.title: Long-Term Durability
feature3.description: We use only premium materials and construction methods that stand the test of time, so your furniture lasts for decades.

home.howItWorksSubtitle: Every project follows our proven process, ensuring exceptional results from start to finish.

step1.title: Consultation
step1.description: We meet to discuss your vision, needs, and budget. Understanding your space and lifestyle is our first priority.

step2.title: 3D Design & Measurements
step2.description: Our designers create detailed 3D renderings and take precise measurements to ensure a perfect fit.

step3.title: Crafting in Our Workshop
step3.description: Skilled craftsmen bring your design to life using quality materials and expert techniques.

step4.title: Delivery & Installation
step4.description: We deliver and professionally install your custom furniture, ensuring everything is perfect.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it – hear from the people who trusted us with their spaces.

client1.name: Maria K.
client1.quote: The team at Ansa transformed our kitchen into exactly what we envisioned. The attention to detail and quality of craftsmanship is outstanding.

client2.name: Alban S.
client2.quote: Professional service from start to finish. They maximized our bedroom storage while maintaining a beautiful, minimalist aesthetic.

client3.name: Elira M.
client3.quote: We couldn't be happier with our custom TV wall unit. It fits perfectly and the quality is exceptional. Highly recommend!
